modlist.Name: Comrade Kolbosa
Author: devyndamonster
modlist.Description:
A TNH character that uses Russian and Czech weapons!
I HIGHLY recommend that you play with the supported gun mods installed, as default equipment pools are somewhat slim

Requirements:
- TNH Tweaker - https://github.com/devyndamonster/TakeAndHoldTweaker

Installation: Drag the .zip file into your Deli/mods folder and unzip. You should see a ComradeKolbasa.deli file in your Deli/mods folder now

Supported Mods:
- Shampoohs Flash Shield - https://bonetome.com/h3vr/weapons/349/
- Meats ASh-12 - https://bonetome.com/h3vr/weapons/267/
- Meats Magazines - https://bonetome.com/h3vr/weapons/170/
- Meats ModulAK - https://bonetome.com/h3vr/weapons/162/
- KamikazeFOXs ModulAR - https://bonetome.com/h3vr/weapons/159/
- Meats ModulAR Parts - https://bonetome.com/h3vr/weapons/157/
- Potatoes Gun Mod - https://bonetome.com/h3vr/weapons/142/
- Meats ModulShotguns -https://bonetome.com/h3vr/weapons/271/
- Carkidds Stechkin APS - https://bonetome.com/h3vr/weapons/281/
- FTW Arms VPO-215 - https://bonetome.com/h3vr/weapons/279/

modlist.Name: PMC Pete
Author: devyndamonster
modlist.Description:
Welcome To Tarkov!
 This character is themed around the game Escape From Tarkov. Start out as a hatchet runner, and take on increasingly difficult enemies. Enemies can drop items and equipment. Additionally, each round has a chance for a scav boss to spawn as a patrol. These bosses are very difficult, but will always drop some kind of item.

(The current version of PMC Pete is lower than the version listed on mod installer, this is a technical necessity due to the way mod installer works, don't worry, everything is probably fine.)

modlist.Name: Time Travel Timmy
Author: devyndamonster
modlist.Description: Progress through each age of weaponry, from wild west to modern

modlist.Name: Sci-Fi Sofia
Author: SirPotatos
modlist.Description:
Sci-Fi Sofia wields futuristic weapons! All sci-fi guns (vanilla and custom) appear in her weapon pools. The weapon pools also have many real guns that have been used in science fiction works or that look futuristic. Enemy progression is currently same as Operator Ori, but will be tweaked later on.
If you have a cool sci-fi vault creation and want it included, send me the vault file on the H3 Homebrew Discord (preferably the json vault file that TNHTweaker generates, and with no magazine in the gun). 
The custom weapons listed below are highly recommended. They are NOT required to play Sofia, but will add more variety to the weapon pools:
ModulAR
Meatâ€™s ModulAR Parts
ModulM4
ModulSR
Outbreak Perfected
Halo: Basic Infantry Weapons
Mk14 EBR
Tavor 21
Desert Tech MDR
AR-57
F2000 Tactical

modlist.Name: John Wurst
Author: SirPotatos
modlist.Description:
You ever wanted to be just like John Wick? Well, you can't. No one is THAT good. BUT, you can totally LARP as John Wick with this new TNH character: John Wurst!!! 
John Wurst's weapon pools ONLY include guns that John Wick has used in the movies. When you buy a gun from the supply room, it will come kitted out exactly like it was in the movie when John used it.
Additionally, custom sosigs have been created to mirror the kinds of enemies that John faces in the three movies. Early sosigs, for example, will be unarmored and have pistols only. But beware the final holds when the High Table enforcers kick in the door.

modlist.Name: Great War Gunther
Author: VolkswagenBeatle
modlist.Description: Hello everyone! This is Great War Gunther, my first character. It's a WWI themed character with progression based off of GI Grayson. Please make sure you are using the latest version of TnHTweaker and that you are on the alpha branch. Remember to report any bugs or other issues to me, as well as give feedback! One last thing, Limited ammo is very hard and endless hasn't been tested fully, so report any issues there.

modlist.Name: All Rounder Randy
Author: Jessica
modlist.Description:
The first custom character ever made (aside from Devyn's, of course...) is now the first on Bonetome! Unless someone else has snuck their way in before me.
All Rounder Randy is arguably the custom character which comes closest to vanilla gameplay, specifically Classic Loadout Louis, but features custom Sosigs and an altered progression, there is a lot less getting screwed over because your luck was bad, and you'll find things you never would've got in most other vanilla characters.

modlist.Name: B.J Blazkomeat
Author: Sam Harper
modlist.Description:
A Wolfenstein 3D inspired custom character for TnH, use a limited arsenal based on the 1992 Dos Game as you dodge patrolling castle guards.
If balancing is bad or there are bugs let me know, I plan to make some changes in the future when I have free time.

modlist.Name: Meatt Fortress Fredd
Author: Trittyburd
modlist.Description: Fight the Meatt Co. personnel with Meatt Co. weaponry!

modlist.Name: Pistol Percy
Author: stark
modlist.Description:
Its Pistols and Machine Pistols only! Attachments are discounted and sosigs are numerous.
Character will appear in the standard/default category.
Installation requires Take n' Hold Tweaker. Place in your H3VR/Mods folder and it should do the rest!

modlist.Name: Scavsig Voicelines
Author: meat_banono
modlist.Description:
For the new PMC Pete character in Take and Hold Tweaker I give you Scavsig voicelines! All 335 voicelines hand picked by yours truly for the most vulgar, realistic, and hardcore Russian experience.
Place the .hotmod inside your mods folder to install.

modlist.Name: Bratwurst Bernie
Author: LqdVR
modlist.Description:
This character features all guns from Germany, Austria and Switzerland from turn of the century, WWI, WWII, crazy cold war space guns all the way up to modern classics.
Loot progression is loosely based on default type characters, with weakest guns at the start, the further you get, the more firepower you will gain.
Oh and I threw in some swanky MP5 foregrips and germanic(probably) medieval weapons for good measure.
The level difficulty is also mostly based on the standard enemy and encryption progression with some tweaks for slighty better playability.
Tested on Update 96.
Standard and limited ammo has been tested pretty thoroughly, endless not so much.
Anyway let me know if you run into some problems or feel like there could be tweaks or improvements.

modlist.Name: Completely Fucked Carl
Author: ilgmesh
modlist.Description:
GTA SA style gang wars, static encryption only
- Ballas, Vagos, Triads and Police, each round introduces a new gang and they're all hostile towards each other
- GTA SA pistols mostly drop from Ballas and Vagos, most of the other SA weapons will randomly drop from the Triads and Police
- Lots of meat to shoot
PROBABLY works best with spawnlock enabled, but there is a free riot shield at the beginning if you're a fan of always being out of ammo.

modlist.Name: ModulAR Adrian
Author: Altra/alvin2503/Altr4
modlist.Description:
I have procrastinated long enough

a character based on the modulAR mod. Start with the modul9mm and work your up to a bigger caliber while customizing your gun.
Manage your resource, use the mag upgrader and cloner to supply yourself with enough ammo to survive.

*NOTE: Iron sights are inaccurate with the Modul9mm (tendencies to shoot high)*


Supported:
-Meats Magazines
-Turt's SidechARger
-TheKeyRing
-Modern Warfighter Optics
-Modern Warfighter Laser and Lights
-FOXArms Muzzles
-FTW Arms Foregrips
-Munchies + the Donut + Chicken!

There's probably more but I don't remember

Last few holds might be too hard
